page.title: 09A School Day.
page.content: Today is Tuesday.I get up at eight, get dressed and then have breakfast. My friend comes for me and we go to school.The bell goes at five to nine, we go in and the teacher takes the register.Most mornings we have mathematics first,then have some milk at twenty five past ten,then we have a break for a quarter of a hour.From then until dinner time we have English,but on a Tuesday we have Welsh at half past eleven.We have one hour for dinner.We pick what we want off the menu.At one o'clock we go in,that is when we have environmental work.At ten to two we go by bus to Connah's Quay Baths,by the time we return to school the home time bell goes at a quarter past three.Sometimes we have homework.
